Text: The Annual Gen Con EN World RPG Awards (or ENnie Awards) are annual, fan-based awards for role-playing game products and publishers hosted at Gen Con in Indianapolis, Indiana.

--------------------
Text: ENnies:  The ENnies were created by Russ Morrissey and Eric Noah and have been run and owned by Russ Morrissey since 2001.
